(◎)○◎ -> 1110001011000
○◎((◎)) -> 101100111100000


1110001011000 + 101100111100000
(◎)○◎        + ○◎((◎))


Remove the trailing 0 and concatinate:

111000101100101100111100000 -> (◎)○◎○◎((◎))








111000 >10< 11000

(◎) >○< ◎ 

        101100111100000
111000 >10110011110000< 11000
(◎)    >○◎((◎))< ◎

111000 10110011110000 11000
  (◎)    ○◎((◎))     ◎

1110001011001111000011000
     (◎)○◎((◎))◎
